summary: This Python script generates a unique UUID, prints the initialization message along with it, and then reads from stdin, printing each input line appended with the same UUID.

details.comment: This Python script generates a unique UUID, prints the initialization message along with it, and then reads from stdin, printing each input line appended with the same UUID.
details.content:
import sys
import uuid
uid = str(uuid.uuid4())
print("init",uid)
for x in sys.stdin:
    print([x],uid)
